name: CrossLink

classitems.description: Computed model ID passed to rendered link-to defined in {{c-l 'init'}}
classitems.name: _modelID

classitems.description: Computed route passed to rendered link-to defined in {{c-l 'init'}}
classitems.name: _route

classitems.description: Handle picking the link to route and model id based on presence of passed properties. If a module or class is not passed look up the current route and model id on the router.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: Optionally specify an item (property/method) to cross link to on a class.
classitems.name: item

description:
The \{{cross-link}} component lets you easily reference other classes, modules, properties and methods in your documentation.

Example

Check out {{cross-link class='FountainheadClass.Meta' item='access'}}

Check out {{cross-link class='FountainheadClass.Meta' item='access'}}

When used as an inline component, the rendered link-to's text will be the ID of the module or class along with any passed query params. If you want different link text you can use the component in block form.

{{#cross-link class='FountainheadClass.Meta' item='access'}}
  Check out the FountainheadClass.Meta components access property
{{/cross-link}}

{{#cross-link class='FountainheadClass.Meta' item='access'}} Check out the FountainheadClass.Meta components access property {{/cross-link}}

Positional Params

The component can also be used with positional parameters when referencing a property or method on the same class.

Check out this components init method: {{cross-link 'init'}}

Check out this components init method: {{cross-link 'init'}}

Alternate Invocation

For maximum terseness Fountainhead also exports the cross link component as \{{c-l}}

Check out this components init method: {{c-l 'init'}}

Check out this components init method: {{c-l 'init'}}

Property Description
class Documentation class to link to
module Documentation module to link to
item Specific documentation item to link to, appended as a query param

Uncomment cases below and check in browser }} {{! --------------------------------------------------------------------- }} {{! Postional Params }} {{!-- {{c-l 'init'}}
--}} {{!-- {{#c-l 'init'}}BLOCK TEXT{{/c-l}}
--}} {{! Passed Item }} {{!-- {{c-l item='init'}}
--}} {{!-- {{#c-l item='init'}}BLOCK TEXT{{/c-l}}
--}} {{! Passed Module }} {{!-- {{c-l module='Addon'}}
--}} {{!-- {{#c-l module='Addon'}}ADDON MODULE{{/c-l}}
--}} {{! Passed Class }} {{!-- {{c-l class='CrossLink' item='init'}}
--}} {{!-- {{#c-l class='CrossLink' item='init'}}BLOCK TEXT{{/c-l}}
--}} {{!-- {{c-l class='FountainheadWelcome'}}
--}} {{!-- {{c-l class='FountainheadWelcome' item='classNames'}}
--}} {{!-- {{#c-l class='FountainheadWelcome' item='classNames'}}BLOCK TEXT{{/c-l}}
--}}
